Holly Willoughby’s outfit choices often leave us in awe. Unsurprisingly, the presenter’s latest look is no exception – check out her beautiful LK Bennett dress.While hosting This Morning, Holly exuded elegance in the ‘Valerie’ midi, styled by Danielle Whiteman with complementary sandals from the coveted brand.  LK Bennett Valerie Blue and Cream Graphic Diamond Print Shirt Dress  Renowned for their shirt dresses, LK Bennett has hit the mark with this number. Made from a lightweight fabric, the classic fit-and-flare silhouette is elevated by a Peter Pan collar and short puff sleeves. On closer inspection, you’ll also notice a charming diamond print, rendered in a summery sky blue colour palette. Holly paired the dress with white LK Bennett 'Florance' Sandals. Equally stylish and comfortable, the buckle detailing and block heel will boost any look.   £299 Shop
